contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Orphan|date=December 2008}} '''Xcaliber International''' is located in [[Pryor, Oklahoma|Pryor, OK]]. It manufacturers a number of [[cigarette]] brands. The most common are Echo, Vortex, and Exeter. It also produces a line of roll-your-own tobacco as well as the [[Chisholm tobacco|Chisholm]] brand of smokeless tobacco. [[Category:Companies based in Oklahoma]] [[Category:Tobacco companies of the United States]] {{US-manufacturing-company-stub}}
